capability.name: Correspondent Bank Relationship Management
capability.definition: This Service Domain manages correspondent bank relations, ensuring reciprocity and developing business where possible
capability.role: Handle the negotiation, development and tracking of reciprocity with correspondent bank relationships
capability.example: A bank establishes and maintains a correspondent relationship for international payments and trade finance representation in a foreign country

key_features.name: Track and assess correspondent bank activity for reciprocity
key_features.description: Enables track and assess correspondent bank activity for reciprocity to support this service domain manages correspondent bank relations, ensuring reciprocity and developing business where possible

key_features.name: Identify and develop business opportunities with the correspondent bank
key_features.description: Enables identify and develop business opportunities with the correspondent bank to support this service domain manages correspondent bank relations, ensuring reciprocity and developing business where possible

key_features.name: Oversee the resolution of production issues as might arise
key_features.description: Enables oversee the resolution of production issues as might arise to support this service domain manages correspondent bank relations, ensuring reciprocity and developing business where possible
